transreg 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Coefficients

    coef.transreg.Rd

    Extracts coefficients

    Usage

    # S3 method for transreg
coef(object, stack = NULL, ...)

    Arguments

    object

    object of class transreg

    stack

    character "lp" (linear predictor stacking) or "mf" (meta-feature stacking)

    ...

    (not applicable)

    Value

    This function returns estimated coefficients. The output is a list with two slots, namely the slot alpha with the estimated intercept (scalar), and the slot beta with the estimated slopes (vector).

    References

    Armin Rauschenberger , Zied Landoulsi , Mark A van de Wiel , and Enrico Glaab (2022). "Penalised regression with multiple sets of prior effects". Manuscript in preparation. armin.rauschenberger@uni.lu

    See also

    Methods for objects of class transreg include coef and predict.

    Examples

    #--- simulation ---
n <- 100; p <- 500
X <- matrix(rnorm(n=n*p),nrow=n,ncol=p)
beta <- rnorm(p)*rbinom(n=p,size=1,prob=0.2)
prior1 <- beta + rnorm(p)
prior2 <- beta + rnorm(p)
y_lin <- X %*% beta
y_log <- 1*(y_lin > 0)

#--- single vs multiple priors ---
one <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1)
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.75 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 5.3e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.3e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.87 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 7.2e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.63 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00014 
#> p-value (-): 0.028 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.5e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.78 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.54 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.7e-06 
#> p-value (-): 0.59 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.36 
#> +
two <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=cbind(prior1,prior2))
#> p-value (+): 0.00015 0.001 
#> p-value (-): 0.53 0.37 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00051 9e-04 
#> p-value (-): 0.57 0.2 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00017 0.0017 
#> p-value (-): 0.91 0.26 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.0027 0.00049 
#> p-value (-): 0.54 0.25 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00066 0.00019 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 0.37 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00026 7.5e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 0.35 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00033 1e-04 
#> p-value (-): 0.72 0.34 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00015 0.0011 
#> p-value (-): 0.69 0.31 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 7e-04 0.00032 
#> p-value (-): 0.52 0.47 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.0028 0.00096 
#> p-value (-): 0.52 0.41 
#> ++
#> p-value (+): 0.00019 0.00011 
#> p-value (-): 0.45 0.5 
#> ++
weights(one)
#> [1] 0.5840583
weights(two)
#> [1] 0.6526205 0.6891202

#--- linear vs logistic regression ---
lin <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1,family="gaussian")
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.1e-06 
#> p-value (-): 0.15 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00053 
#> p-value (-): 0.44 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00048 
#> p-value (-): 0.54 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.27 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.25 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.6 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.59 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.59 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.37 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00012 
#> p-value (-): 0.56 
#> +
log <- transreg(y=y_log,X=X,prior=prior1,family="binomial")
#> p-value (+): 1.1e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.31 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 7e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.38 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.43 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.1e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.36 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.8e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.25 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.1e-08 
#> p-value (-): 0.36 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.5e-06 
#> p-value (-): 0.3 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.3e-08 
#> p-value (-): 0.35 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.1e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.16 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.7e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.31 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.1e-07 
#> p-value (-): 0.35 
#> +
hist(predict(lin,newx=X)) # predicted values

hist(predict(log,newx=X)) # predicted probabilities


#--- ridge vs lasso penalisation ---
ridge <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1,alpha=0)
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00022 
#> p-value (-): 0.52 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.64 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.3e-06 
#> p-value (-): 0.57 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.54 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00014 
#> p-value (-): 0.77 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.6 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 8.3e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.57 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.1e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.56 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00011 
#> p-value (-): 0.56 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4.7e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.91 
#> +
lasso <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1,alpha=1)
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.58 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 7.3e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.57 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 8.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 1 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00013 
#> p-value (-): 0.57 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.5e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.76 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 1.5e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.058 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.48 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 3.7e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.3e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.44 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00043 
#> p-value (-): 0.46 
#> +
# initial coefficients (without prior)
plot(x=coef(ridge$base)[-1]) # dense

plot(x=coef(lasso$base)[-1]) # sparse

# final coefficients (with prior)
plot(x=coef(ridge)$beta) # dense

plot(x=coef(lasso)$beta) # not sparse


#--- exponential vs isotonic calibration ---
exp <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1,scale="exp")
#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

#> +

iso <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior1,scale="iso")
#> p-value (+): 2.6e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00011 
#> p-value (-): 0.29 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.33 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00016 
#> p-value (-): 0.49 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.64 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 2.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.13 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 7.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.67 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 5.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.77 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00014 
#> p-value (-): 0.55 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 5.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.39 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 5.6e-06 
#> p-value (-): 0.53 
#> +
plot(x=prior1,y=exp$prior$calib)

plot(x=prior1,y=iso$prior$calib)


#--- linear predictor vs meta-feature stacking ---
prior <- c(prior1[1:250],rep(0,250))
lp <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior,stack="lp")
#> p-value (+): 0.00019 
#> p-value (-): 0.39 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.45 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00091 
#> p-value (-): 0.31 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 6.8e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.38 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00038 
#> p-value (-): 0.31 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00092 
#> p-value (-): 0.26 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.0012 
#> p-value (-): 0.28 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00021 
#> p-value (-): 0.35 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00025 
#> p-value (-): 0.68 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00043 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00077 
#> p-value (-): 0.6 
#> +
mf <- transreg(y=y_lin,X=X,prior=prior,stack="mf")
#> p-value (+): 0.00019 
#> p-value (-): 0.39 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00066 
#> p-value (-): 0.34 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00024 
#> p-value (-): 0.44 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 9.9e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.63 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00072 
#> p-value (-): 0.32

#> p-value (+): 0.00093 
#> p-value (-): 0.51 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 4e-04 
#> p-value (-): 0.54 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 5.4e-05 
#> p-value (-): 0.52 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00038 
#> p-value (-): 0.49 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00044 
#> p-value (-): 0.34 
#> +
#> p-value (+): 0.00088 
#> p-value (-): 0.2 
#> +
plot(x=coef(lp$base)[-1],y=coef(lp)$beta)

plot(x=coef(mf$base)[-1],y=coef(mf)$beta)
